title: Tube Map - TfL London Underground route planner
description:
Tube Map, the navigation app that makes getting around on the London Underground faster and easier. The award-winning Tube Map has over 19 million downloads worldwide, making it the #1 London Underground app!
Key features
★ The official Transport for London (TfL) Tube Map in an interactive app.
★ Real-time route planner that will navigate you around disruptions on the Tube.
★ Easy to use both with and without an internet connection.
★ Uses live data from Transport for London (TfL) to give station information and train times.
★ Be first to hear about delays and closures on the London Underground with line status notifications.
Additional features...
• Find your way around the London Underground with Tube Map’s journey planner and step-by-step directions.
• Compare the time and cost of different routes to see when it's faster or cheaper to take the bus.
• Save all of your favourite routes in one place for faster route planning when on the go.
• View your closest London Underground stations from any location.
• See how accessible a station is when travelling on foot, with heavy luggage, with a pram/pushchair or as a wheelchair user.
• Get detailed station information about facilities such as toilets, cash and ticket machines, WIFI access and taxi ranks.
• Check your line status notifications on the move with Notification Dots. Just long press on the app icon to glance at what's happening on the Tube (available to devices running Android Oreo).
• Includes official TfL Night Tube and National Rail maps.
• Twitter feed with the latest London Underground news and line status updates.
• Line Status Widget available, keeping you up to date on the status of up to three Tube lines.
• Quick access to the Route Planner, Line Status and Favourites with App Shortcuts (available to devices running Android 7.1 and up).
Mapway is the world's number one in public transport apps, check out Bus Times London, Paris Metro Map and New York Subway Map on Google Play today.
Like Tube Map on Facebook at
www.facebook.com/TubeMap
or follow us on Twitter
@TubeMapLondon
. We'd love to hear from you.
To get the most out of Tube Map London Underground, the app uses a number of permissions. Click here
www.mapway.com/privacy-policy
to see what and why.
